name: OpenMageModuleFostering/Reserv
description: Reserv, the New Layaway, is a digital layaway solution for modern e-Commerce. Drive conversion and revenue by offering your customers one more way to buy. Cut cost through automation and smart inventory management controls. Offer layaway on only the products that you select, set down payment minimums and plan duration maximums. Sell more to your existing customers and open up a new customer base for your products.
